body:
Hey, I was wondering something. Soooooo.... Recently, I've gotten a good idea on the avicus nebula map build. But how do I participate as a builder? And also, how do you send the map? I am really new to the server so yeah, can anyone rely back? Thanks much appreciated :).

regards, noarion

title: Building Maps??

replies.body: Heey, look in the map development section, this can help you. Good luck ;D
replies.body_tagged: Heey, look in the map development section, this can help you. Good luck ;D

replies.body:
Anyone can make a map, you don't need permission or anything. Just generate a void world and build your map! Many people like to do this on a personal server, but you can do it in single player too.

Once you've completed your map you'll need to upload the world file to a file sharing website such as Dropbox or Media Fire. Then you can create a new thread in the 'Map Releases' sub-forum with the name of your map, a link to the world download, a YAML file (refer to this page) and preferably some images too.

Good luck with your idea! :)
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: Ok thanks! I will be thinking of a great map. Thanks for your replies! ^^
